mapper.select:
with A as ( select count(*) numbeT, CPZDBH from dwm_vlms_one_order_to_end group by CPZDBH )
SELECT case when CPZDBH != '' then A.numbeT else 0 end as SAME_PLATE_NUM, VIN,BRAND,BASE_NAME,VEHICLE_NAME,START_CITY_NAME,END_CITY_NAME,VDWDM,DEALER_NAME,CPZDBH, CP9_OFFLINE_TIME,LEAVE_FACTORY_TIME,IN_SITE_TIME,IN_WAREHOUSE_NAME,TASK_NO,VEHICLE_RECEIVING_TIME, STOWAGE_NOTE_NO,TRAFFIC_TYPE,ASSIGN_TIME,CARRIER_NAME,ACTUAL_OUT_TIME,SHIPMENT_G_TIME,TRANSPORT_VEHICLE_NO, SAME_PLATE_NUM,VEHICLE_NUM,START_WATERWAY_NAME,IN_START_WATERWAY_TIME,END_START_WATERWAY_TIME, END_WATERWAY_NAME,IN_END_WATERWAY_TIME,START_PLATFORM_NAME,IN_START_PLATFORM_TIME,OUT_START_PLATFORM_TIME, END_PLATFORM_NAME,IN_END_PLATFORM_TIME,UNLOAD_SHIP_TIME,UNLOAD_RAILWAY_TIME,IN_DISTRIBUTE_TIME, DISTRIBUTE_ASSIGN_TIME,DISTRIBUTE_CARRIER_NAME,DISTRIBUTE_VEHICLE_NO,DISTRIBUTE_VEHICLE_NUM, OUT_DISTRIBUTE_TIME,DISTRIBUTE_SHIPMENT_TIME,DTVSDHSJ,FINAL_SITE_TIME,TYPE_G,TYPE_T,TYPE_S,TYPE_TC FROM dwm_vlms_one_order_to_end TOEND left join A on TOEND.CPZDBH = A.CPZDBH
order by TOEND.VEHICLE_RECEIVING_TIME desc
limit ${params.limitStart}, ${params.limitEnd}

SELECT VIN FROM dwm_vlms_one_order_to_end where VIN in
#{vvin}
